page.title: 13A Day in my Life
page.content: It was 1:30 a.m and I heard the telephone ring. Mum answered. When I heard Dad go outside and start the car,I knew he had gone on a veterinary call. Later the alarm clock woke me and after breakfast I fetched my pony from the field. I put him in the stable and then fetched the lambs' milk. It was a hot day, so after feeding the tame lambs I put them out in the field. My sister and I went for a ride on our two ponies, Holly and Turpin. In the afternoon I cleaned my tack and helped to move the bullocks to a different field. After tea I turned Turpin out into his field and watched television. Then I went to bed.
